snippet: The results of the Thursday night auction were strikingly similar to those of the sale at Christie’s on Wednesday.
abstract: Sotheby's auction of Impressionist and modern art hits many bumpy patches, not unlike those of an auction the previous evening at Christie's; star of the night is Still Life With Tulips, a 1932 portrait by Picasso, that sold for $41.5 million.
lead_paragraph: The results of the Thursday night auction were strikingly similar to those of the sale at Christie’s on Wednesday.

headline.seo: Picasso Stars in Sotheby’s Auction, With 5 of Top 10 Sales
headline.main: Picasso Is Star of Sotheby’s Sale, With 5 of the Top 10
headline.print_headline: Picasso Is Star of Sotheby’s Sale, With 5 of the Top 10
